message.content: cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL. The paper discusses the application of BERT for ad hoc document retrieval, which is a task commonly studied in the information retrieval (IR) community. Therefore, cs.IR is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves natural language processing (NLP) techniques, which are often studied in the sub-categories of cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, and cs.DL.
